Text: looks interesting thankyou.....is there a list of the books anywhere ?

Thank you, concilium - this is a very nice listing of Project Gutenberg books, and I am happily downloading at this moment.

to Gwelli: If you click the number to the right of the word "Files:" under the header above, it should give you a list of the files in the Torrent, which in this case also includes the book titles.
